name: Rakugo Detective
description:
This is a narrative-heavy game wherein you experience the life of a samurai-turned-travelling Rakugo performer. Rakugo is the Japanese art of 'sit down comedy'. A performer sits on a mat and performs a full comedic play with only themselves as the lone actor - performing all the parts by turning their heads, changing their facial expressions, and altering their voice.

Button Menu:

Movement = Arrow Keys

Select/Advance Dialogue = Space or Enter

Menu = Escape
